quote_last:
S-line bus proceeding in the direction of Porte de Champerret arrive on that day?
—At 12:38 p.m.
–Were there many people on the aforesaid S-bus?
–Bags of ‘em.
–Did you particularly notice any of them?
–An individual who had a very a long neck and a plait round his hat.
title: Exercises in Style
author: Raymon Queneau
